Detailed Description

The base class for all display windows of BibleTime.

Author:
The BibleTime team

const bool CDisplayWindow::init (  const QString &    key )  [virtual]
 

Initialize the window.

Call this method from the outside, because calling this in the constructor is not possible!

void CDisplayWindow::lookup (  const QString &    module,
const QString &    key
)  [virtual, slot]
 

Lookup the specified key in the given module.

If the module is not chosen withing this display window create a new displaywindow with the right module in it.
